_source.text: 1. Henry Aaron - my favorite player, I wear 44 on my softball jersey 2. Frank Robinson 3. Billy Williams - better than #4 but a pretty similar player.

text: 1. **Henry** **Aaron** - my favorite player, I wear 44 on my softball jersey 2. Frank Robinson 3. Billy Williams - **better** **than** #4 but a pretty similar player.
